title: Why U.S. Health Care Systems Weren’t Prepared for COVID-19
itunes:title: Why U.S. Health Care Systems Weren’t Prepared for COVID-19
description:
Dr. Vivian Lee, President of Health Platforms at Verily Life Sciences, discusses why U.S. health care systems were not prepared for the coronavirus outbreak. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Reporter Shelly Banjo talk about this week’s cover story on Google’s search monopoly and its impact on small-business advertising. Bloomberg News Sustainability Editor Emily Chasan walks through America’s green mortgage dilemma. And we Drive to the Close with with Larry Pitkowsky, Co-Managing Partner at Goodhaven Capital Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
